name: sanctification
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of making something or someone holy: The holy water was used for purification and sanctification. See
sanctify
the fact of considering someone or something as perfect or impossible to criticize: He is a nice guy, but does he deserve such sanctification? the sanctification of "family values"
More examplesFewer examplesThe film approaches its subject with a reverence bordering on sanctification.As an artist he has undergone a kind of sanctification.There has been a simplistic sanctification of her as a leader, despite the serious mistakes she has made.
